com.episodic.platform.client
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  com.episodic.platform.client.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to make the actual requests to the Episodic Platform API. This class holds user credential information.

Connection

public Connection(java.lang.String episodicAPIKey,
                  java.lang.String episodicSecretKey)
Constructor

Parameters:
episodicAPIKey - the user's API key to use as part of the request.
episodicSecretKey - the user's secret key to use to sign the request.

Connection

public Connection(java.lang.String episodicAPIKey,
                  java.lang.String episodicSecretKey,
                  java.lang.String apiHost,
                  int apiPort)
Constructor.

Parameters:
episodicAPIKey - the user's API key to use as part of the request.
episodicSecretKey - the user's secret key to use to sign the request.
apiHost - the overridden API host to use
apiPort - the overridden API port to use

                      boolean parseResponse)
               throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      ResponseException,
                      javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
Makes a GET request to the Episodic Platform API server.

Parameters:
apiName - the name of the API service to use.
methodName - the name of the API method to invoke.
params - the list of params to include in the query string
parseResponse - true if the response should be parsed as XML.
Returns:
a response object that includes the deserialized response data.
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException
